english.segment1: I've been walking with a big grin. singing with my eyes closed. liftin' up my hands. I've been lost in the moment. sendin' up praises. now I think I understand
english.segment2: When I open up and let it flow. I feel your touch and then I know.
english.segment3: Chorus: I can never live without it. and I'm never gonna doubt it. everyday is new. yeah. there's nothing any better. I'll be singing it forever. I worship You
english.segment4: I'm standing on the edge now. looking to a new place. goin' deeper still. the feeling is electric. the Power and the Glory. just move me where You will
english.segment5: cuz you take this song and make it fly. into my soul and that is why
english.segment7: I just wanna dive into your grace. I wanna feel your presence, seek your face. I just wanna be where you are
english.segment8: I can never live without it. and I'm never gonna doubt it. everyday is new yea
